revised_title: The Influence of Boron on Nodule Development and Functioning in Vicia faba
tldr: This study investigates the relationship between the presence or absence of boron in the nutrient medium and the development, structure, and functioning of nodules on Vicia faba plants. The research shows that the absence of boron leads to smaller and less developed nodules, while the presence of boron promotes healthy nodule growth. The findings suggest that boron plays a crucial role in plant growth and nodule development, and it may be beneficial for the entry of the nodule organism into the plant tissues.
